sections.heading: Wild Game Preserve; firearms, hunting, and fishing prohibited
sections.text: Except as provided in section 37-713, it shall be unlawful for any person to carry firearms, hunt, or fish within the limits of the State Wild Game Preserve.SourceLaws 1927, c. 30, ยง 3, p. 147;C.S.1929, ยง 37-417;R.S.1943, ยง 37-417;Laws 19
